#include <iostream>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ll t,n,s,e,f,x,y;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    cin>>s>>e;
	    cin>>n;
	    f = 1;
	    while(n--){
	        cin>>x>>y;
            if(y<=s || x>=e && f!=0)   
                f=1;
            else
                f=0;
	    }
	    if(f==1)
	        cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	    else
	        cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
